mapper.select: SELECT pc.*, u.nickname AS author_nickname FROM post_comments pc JOIN users u ON pc.commenter_idx = u.user_idx WHERE pc.post_idx = #{postIdx} -- 완전 화면에서 제거하지 않고 삭제된 댓글입니다라는 형태로 표기하기위해 일단 주석 처리 AND pc.is_deleted='N' ORDER BY NVL(pc.parent_comment_id, pc.comment_idx), --부모 댓글 먼저 pc.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comments ( post_idx, commenter_idx, parent_comment_id, content, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{postIdx}, #{commenterIdx}, #{parentCommentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{content}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE post_comments SET is_deleted = 'Y', deleted_by = #{userIdx}, deleted_at = SYSDATE WHERE comment_idx = #{commentIdx}
